battleTactics.name: Callous Overlord
battleTactics.description: Pick 1 friendly SUMMONABLE unit more than 3'' from all enemy units. You complete this tactic if that friendly unit is destroyed during this turn.

battleTactics.name: Cursed Unlife
battleTactics.description: You complete this tactic if any wounds allocated to your general or to 2 other friendly VAMPIRE units are healed using The Hunger ability during this turn.

battleTactics.name: Death by a Thousand Cuts
battleTactics.description: Pick 1 enemy unit. You complete this tactic if wounds caused by attacks made by 3 or more different friendly units were allocated to that unit during this turn.

battleTactics.name: An Enrapturing Blur
battleTactics.description: Pick 1 enemy HERO that has 0 wounds allocated to it. You complete this tactic if that unit is destroyed in the combat phase of this turn before it is picked to fight.
